page.title: 08Boscombe Village
page.content: In {Boscombe}there is a cemetery where the people from the village are buried .There is also a{church}in{Boscombe } dedicated to {St Andrew}.The walls are made of flint and plaster.There are some very old graves in the graveyard. There is an old part to our village and a new part.The old part of the village is away from the main road down a little lane .Thats where the { {church}and old cottages are. The new part of the village consists of some council houses one old cottage where I live ,a cemetery a pub and a fiew more cottages.We have a bus stop opposite the council houses.In the old part of the village there is a bridle path leading to one of the two big farms. by{PAUL CROOK
